title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1157.3 - Applicability and general rule
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1157.3 - Applicability and general rule

State Regulations
(a) The provisions of this Part shall be effective as of the dates prescribed in
SEQR. (b) All actions of the
authority shall be fully subject to this Part and the procedures contained in
this Part shall be followed except for actions undertaken or approved prior to
the effective date or dates of SEQR, exempt acts, ministerial acts, Type II
actions and actions which are a part of, and in compliance with, a program for
which an environmental impact statement has been prepared. (c) No commitment to commence or to engage in
an action for which an FEIS is required pursuant to this Part or to issue to an
applicant a permit which grants permission to such applicant to commence or
engage in an action for which an FEIS is required pursuant to this Part shall
be made by the authority until after the filing of an FEIS for such action and
until after the authority has made the decision making findings as are required
in section
1157.9
of this Part and, in the
case of an applicant, all requisite fees and costs have been paid by the
applicant. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1157.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
